steps.name: When  user open the Homepage of dsportal and click get started button
Given  user Navigate to the Register Page of DSPortal
And  the user enters valid password  "gill"
Then  user should get an error message below password confirmation box

labels.name: story
labels.value: check if user can register successfully when only confirmatory password field is blank
